subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Shane Lowry birdied his closing two holes for a two-under-par 70 to join Thomas Bjorn in the lead after the second round of the BMW PGA Championship in Virginia Water, England.
snippet: Shane Lowry birdied his closing two holes for a two-under-par 70 to join Thomas Bjorn in the lead after the second round of the BMW PGA Championship in Virginia Water, England.
